# videoCompressionProperties

**Instance Property**

The compression properties for encoding movie clips that are to be overwritten.

## Declaration

```swift
var videoCompressionProperties: [String : any NSSecureCoding & NSObjectProtocol]? { get set }
```

## Discussion

See [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVVideoCompressionPropertiesKey] for a list of available properties.

## Configuring Movie Clips

- **clipDuration**: The duration of movie clips sent the to the movie clip handler extension.
